channel.title: Softlayer_hardware_attribute on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_hardware_attribute on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Attribute Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Attribute type contains general information for a hardware attribute. Hardware attributes can be assigned to specific hardware objects to describe relatively arbitrary information. Local hardwareAttributeTypeId The unique identifier of a hardware attribute's type. Type: integer id A hardware attribute's unique identifier. Type: integer value A hardware attribute's value. Type: string Relational hardwareAttributeType The type of hardware attribute that this represents.
